website_summaries.verdict: A stylish model with useful functions and a low price tag.
pros: A compact microwave with a streamlined design and an appealing price
Wields 700 watts of cooking power and features several handy presets like speed defrost, pizza, popcorn, and reheat
cons: Takes a little extra time to heat thoroughly compared to some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Great small microwave.
customer_reviews.text: We got this to fit in an Ikea upper kitchen cabinet and it works great. Plenty of room in the back. I like the quick cook buttons, can just press 1-6 and it starts cooking right away.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine, if it didn't come dented
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I was getting into with the size, and I'm very disappointed that it came dented. It isn't (yet) impacting the usage, so I'm keeping it as I was in desperate need of a way to heat food living in a small space. If I had more money, though, I would have went with a more recognizable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: Have used the microwave for two days. Does the job at a good price. Seems a little stronger than 700w. Drones a little loud but at this price point one can't expect perfection. Addendum, October 24, 2020: Use it several times a day for almost 1 year. Still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: gernab

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Correct size for my daughter’s first apartment and easy for her to use - very important because she is autistic
customer_reviews.author: therese.boies

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fancy just a microwave
customer_reviews.text: Works well , but seems to be a lower wattage microwave so takes a little longer to heat some things. Nothing fancy , but works for our family
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: SPONTANEOUS STARTING
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect size for my son's apartment, just for warming up things. Its not huge. However, it had a problem with starting up by itself when the door was closed. No one even needed to be near it. Don't know if that is a product issue or a manufacturer issue. However, Amazon made the return super easy. No fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Ann C. Wiler

customer_reviews.title: Nice little microwave
customer_reviews.text: I like this microwave. I needed something smaller than the ancient monster I'd been using for years. It's just the right size, has easy to see buttons, heats food well. I gave it four instead of five stars because either it doesn't do seconds or I'm not smart enough to figure how to do it. I have to hit one minute and then watch it.
customer_reviews.author: pattiJ

customer_reviews.title: New Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Was everything I wanted in a microwave. We placed it on top of the refrigerator and everyone can reach it perfectly. I am very pleased with how it works. It arrived right on time and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Stenski

customer_reviews.title: It works fine, and it does the job. No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, and it does the job. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The microwave works as it’s supposed to. I bought it a few days ago. I am still figuring out the buttons and such. It’s a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Needed a simple ,small microwave for work and this machine definitely fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G. Shinnick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my mom!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small. Works very well and arrived very quickly. Definitely worth the price. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: The Rheins

customer_reviews.title: Product Defective
customer_reviews.text: Product I received was defective - upon plugging it in it would not stop running unless the door was left open. Buttons were entirely unresponsive, had to return and get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: bz

customer_reviews.title: Sharp look
customer_reviews.text: Didnt come in english It runs then stops and then starts and customer service number is no help ... Product looks sharp but not working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: Daughter uses at school apartment. She says it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Payton Smith

customer_reviews.title: DOA!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. Light came on and made noise as if working, but didn't cook....
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D. Howland Jr.

customer_reviews.title: small microwave
customer_reviews.text: Great little microwave for the money. Great for my office. Works well and is all I need for heating my lunch!!
customer_reviews.author: julesburg

customer_reviews.title: The light went out inside in three days
customer_reviews.text: This was for my kitchen, after three days the light on the inside went out, not worth my money or time to send it or call for replacement just have to go with the flow, Everything else is great I like the look I like the way it looks inside, easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: JMBrown

customer_reviews.title: Nothing is perfect but it comes close!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a microwave that was smaller than the one I had and this seemed to be the one. As I"ve gotten older I need to use glasses more often and this microwave has small letters so on go the glasses. I'm sure that once I learn where certain buttons are I won't need to have my glasses with me. Over all it is the perfect size for me who only warms up coffee or a piece of something to go with the drink!!! lololol
customer_reviews.author: Daun S.

customer_reviews.title: Aspercreme with Lidocaine Maximum Strength Pain Relief Cream, 4.7 oz.
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple issues that cause me pain: Fibromyalgia, issues with my nerves, arthritis throughout my body including my lower back, etc. Aspercreame has been a big help to me in dealing with the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The microwave works just fine, but it makes a lot of noise, one of the track wheels was broken off, and the track itself was snapped. Other than those few things I have nothing to complain about. I did get $10.00 off the orginal price ,I can live with a broken track and a missing wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect microwave for the price. Only mildly upset that it is just a tad weaker than my previous microwave so heating something up may take longer than expected, but is an easy adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave SUCKS. It took 4 minutes to heat up a cup of coffee and an additional 8 minutes to cook rice pilaf last night. If I had a baseball bat, I’d be using it.
customer_reviews.author: JJ Designs

customer_reviews.title: Works well but frustrating to open - Button sticks
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Only giving three stars because the button to open it doesn’t work very well and I sometimes have to fight with it to get the microwave to open.
customer_reviews.author: Norse woman 99

customer_reviews.title: Good small microwave
customer_reviews.text: I don't do any serious cooking with a microwave but I do use one for reheating a leftover dish. This is an excellent product at its price point for what I had intended to use it for, and a standard sized large dinner plate fits perfectly inside.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore A Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect for my apartment, not too big and not too small. Heats up my food fast, I'm impressed
customer_reviews.author: isabelle f.

customer_reviews.title: Compact Affordable Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our small kitchen. Arrived very quickly. Quality heating, food is fully heated through. It's also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Hannan

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER 60 DAYS!
customer_reviews.text: THE MICROWAVE STOPPED WORKING AFTER 60 DAYS! NO HEAT AND CANT RETURN!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimetta A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Most definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Only thing was a little piece on the turntable was broken but CS was a great help in getting a free part for me
customer_reviews.author: Diane Evans

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: noisy and infrequent arcing, avoid this item danby microwave dmw07a4wdb, and control panel hard to read in dim light.
customer_reviews.author: Grandfather Otter, N A Flute artist

product_meta.title: Danby DMW07A4WDB 0.7 cu. ft. Microwave Oven, White.7 cu.ft
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteIf you’re looking for the perfect countertop microwave oven for your lunchroom, office, cottage or kitchen, the search can end here with this economical and practical model by Danby. This fashionable appliance adds a touch of class to any setting with its modern black or white finish. It serves up 0. 7 cubic feet (20 liters) of internal cooking space for all your favorite dishes. There are 10 different power levels to choose from with the maximum option providing 700 watts of cooking power. In addition, one-touch cooking can easily be enjoyed for six of the most popular microwave uses and there’s also a trio of specialty programs which allow you to choose to cook by weight, defrost by weight, and speed defrost your food. The contemporary and compact microwave comes with an automatic oven light and turntable as well as an easy-to-program electronic LED timer and clock unit.
feature_bullets: Spacious 0. 7 cu. ft. capacity microwave with 700 watts cooking power
10 power levels with 6 simple one touch options

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars218 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
